etomica.models.co2

Class PNGCPMX

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.potential.PotentialMolecular
      • etomica.models.co2.PNGCPM
        • etomica.models.co2.PNGCPMX
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPotential, IPotentialMolecular, PotentialPolarizable

    public class PNGCPMX
extends PNGCPM
    GCPM potential that allows combining parameters to be adjusted. All combining rules are adjusted the same way (not what you want for a ternary mixture).
